item.description:
NOTE: The meetup location has changed! We are meeting at 6pm at the Betahouse which is at 13 Magazine St. #2, just a couple blocks west of Mass Ave in Central Square. Here is a Google map to parking options. We will order some pizzas and can stay as late as we want.

Agenda: We'll be holding a minisprint to develop our bostonplone.org website. We welcome all levels of developers and users. Maybe you want to write some blog entries, or add a photo gallery. Perhaps you're interested in skinning the site, or upgrading the site to Plone 3.0 -- help to make the site yours! Bring your ideas, questions, and enthusiasm.

For inspiration and ideas, take a look at what other Plone user groups are doing:
http://plone.org/supp...
item.name: The Boston Plone December Meetup
